SubstanceOutputDesc Struct Reference

Substance output description and current state structure definition. More...

#include <outputdesc.h>

Data Fields

  • unsigned int outputId

Detailed Description

Substance output description and current state structure definition.

Filled using the substanceHandleGetOutputDesc function declared in handle.h.

Field Documentation

unsigned int SubstanceOutputDesc::outputId

Output unique identifier.

unsigned int SubstanceOutputDesc::level0Width

Width of the texture.

unsigned int SubstanceOutputDesc::level0Height

Height of the texture.

unsigned char SubstanceOutputDesc::pixelFormat

Pixel format of the texture.

See also:
pixelformat.h

unsigned char SubstanceOutputDesc::mipmapCount

Depth of the mipmap pyramid (0: full pyramid).

SubstanceOutputState SubstanceOutputDesc::state

Current output state.
